channel.title: Comments on: Working with multiple of lists in JavaScript
channel.description: On programming and text editing. Addicted to lisps.

item.title: By: guest
item.dc:creator: guest
item.description:
It could be succinct by chaining:
_(gists).flatMap(gist => _.values(gist.files)) .filter(file => file.language === 'JavaScript') .map(file => file.filename) .values()
item.content:encoded:
It could be succinct by chaining:

_(gists).flatMap(gist => _.values(gist.files))
.filter(file => file.language === ‘JavaScript’)
.map(file => file.filename)
.values()
